article_title: 90 Percent of Large Employers Hit By Obamacare 'Cadillac Tax'
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: large, employers, hit, obamacare, cadillac, tax

og.description: Ninety percent of large employers are looking for ways to avoid the so-called "Cadillac tax" on employee insurance plans deemed too cushy by the Affordable Care Act, according to a new study.
